data.subject: Chained To The Rhythm (Feat. Skip Marley)
data.lyric:
Are we crazy
 Living our lives through a lens
 Trapped in our white picket fence
 Like ornaments
 So

그때는 달콤한 말에 취해 
 날 죽이고 그저
